Text:
Works great! Recommended!
Important: when using on Win7, make sure you run on admin permission.

Great! Very fast download speed. The KeyGen works perfect, and NaviCat gives no problems.

-- Simple Steps:

1. Download the Torrent via uTorrent

2. After the torrent is finished, open up the file, and extract the files inside using WinRar.

3. Open up the Keygen, and copy the serial code they gave you.

4. Open up NaviCat and click "Register" and use the serial code you copied.

Your good to go, I used this on Windows 7 with uTorrent, it worked great, some might have to run as administrator.
